textos_fuente.text: Contact the Team | Enrollware Skip to content Client Login All-in-One Platform Solutions Healthcare/AHA Corporate Government Continuing Education Pricing Contact Sign Up Contact Enrollware How to Reach Us To reach a representative, fill out the contact form on this page or give us a call. Phone: Support: 561-247-2432 Support Hours: Monday-Friday (8am-6pm ET) Email: Sales Inquiries: info@enrollware.com Support: support@enrollware.com Mailing Address: Fullsteam Software Holdings LLC DBA Enrollware Software 540 Devall Drive, Suite 301 Auburn, AL 36832 Password Assistance? Please contact your training center administrator. Enrollware can only issue usernames or passwords for the primary administrators of our direct clients. You can get in touch with our team by completing the enquiry form that is accessible via the 'Help' button on the bottom right of this page. If your enquiry is urgent, you can get in contact using the details below: Enquiries : Enquiries@No1Lounges.com Press : Digital@No1Lounges.com Careers : Careers@No1Lounges.com Telephone : +44(0) 203 283 8449 Lines are open from 09:00 to 17:00, Monday to Friday. Please note, our phone lines will be closed on public holidays. Full name Email address Telephone How can we help? Yes, I give permission to store and process my data. About Us | Lounge 38 Home Menu About Us Who We Are Our Team Testimonial Our Client Policy Staff Login Our Service Reservation News Events Complaint Contact Login 0 About us Where we all strart. Home About Us WHO WE ARE Few Words About US Welcome To Our Team!! We welcome you to Loungethirty8. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you and want you to know that we recognize our employees as our most valuable resource. Our continued success in providing the highest quality of food, beverages and service to our customers depends on having quality people like yourself and your fellow employees. We want you to enjoy your time here and are committed to helping you succeed in your new job. MESSAGE FROM LOUNGETHIRTY8 Loungethirty8’s success depends on our people. Our restaurant, lounge & bar can only prosper and provide opportunities for employment and growth when we continually improve ourselves, and the work we do. We recognize however, that success is not measured by sales; guest counts, and numbers alone. Lounge38 Our Teams The Teams and Crews x Obinma C. J Chairman / Managing Director x Okeke Andrew Obiora Chief Operations Officer x Chukwudi Adigwe Chief Accountant x Wonuola Aregbesola General Manager COME & EXPERIENCES OUR BEST OF WORLD CLASS CUISINE + WEALTH OF CLASSIC MUSIC LIBRARY CLICK HERE Our Mission Few Words About US Loungethirty8’s mission is to enrich the lives of our guests, our employees and owners. We do this through superior quality food and beverages, legendary customer service, sales growth, cost controls and treating our employees like family. We believe that our employees are our most important resource and our success depends upon creating and retaining a staff capable of delivering an exceptional dining experience to every customer, every time. Our Location Lounge 38 Head Office: 67, Bode Thomas Street, Surulere, Lagos
07025005437, 07015143711 Call for Reservations: 07015143711 E-mail: info@loungethirty8.com.ng Latest News After Dark Fusion with Jagermeister Time to Jager!!!! Saturday 26th Feb | 10pm with... Comedy Party Night With so much power to heal and renew, the... Salsa Give Away Party with Paul Salsa Join us today! Let's experience the best part... Opening Times Monday 24hrs Tuesday 24hrs Wednesday 24hrs Thursday 24hrs Friday 24hrs Saturday 24hrs Sunday 24hrs Location 2015 ALL RIGHT RESERVED. POWERED BY Lounge 38 Need Help? Chat With US Now Lounge 38

              $ | Zimbabwe Instagram Home Shop THIRTY1 OG'S WATCHES THIRTY1 1 OF 1 ONE OF A KIND & VINTAGE BASICS About Us Search Log in Cart Item added to your cart View cart Check out Continue shopping About Us The name THIRTY1 is a tribute to the year 1931, the year my grandfather was born—a man whose legacy is the cornerstone of this brand. THIRTY1 jewelry embodies a unique duality: the toughness and resilience that my grandfather displayed throughout his life, coupled with an undeniable elegance that defined his love and devotion to those who mattered most. My grandfather was a man who didn’t care what others thought—he lived by his own rules, unapologetically. This same spirit is reflected in THIRTY1 jewelry, which challenges traditional norms and empowers you to wear what makes you feel authentic and strong. In my journey through the world of jewelry and design, I've come to understand that true luxury lies in the freedom to script your own story. THIRTY1 isn't just about showcasing my designs; it's about inspiring you to curate a narrative that extends from your finger-stacked rings to your wrist-adorned arm stacks. This brand is designed to evoke a sense of empowerment and confidence, allowing you to feel good in every piece you choose. Rings have always been my forte, my second skin, almost like a personal armor. Having grown up in my father's jewelry store, experimenting with various combinations and designs has been a lifelong passion. My style, like my stacks of “armor," has evolved over the years, encompassing not only my designs but also a mix of vintage, one-of-a-kind pieces, and watches sourced from around the globe. Jewelry is meant to be fun, a form of self-expression that defies boundaries. I'm not here to dictate the perfect combination of pieces; I'm here to share the feeling of liberation, chaos, and creativity that designing and curating these pieces has given me. This is more than a brand; it's an invitation to dive headfirst into your individuality, amplify your style of self-expression, and deck yourself out in some badass shit. Welcome to the unapologetic life of THIRTY1. Luxury for the nonconformist. Subscribe to our emails Be the first to be notified of new collection drops and restocks. Email Shipping & Returns Terms of Service Warranty FAQ'S Watches & Authenticity Instagram © 2025, THIRTY1 Powered by Shopify Question? for more information, picture, sizing details or custom requests, please send us an email at info@thirty1jewelry.com Choosing a selection results in a full page refresh.
